DOC.brief_summary: This multicenter cluster-randomized trial will evaluate the impact of Crew Resource Management training on the occurrence of postoperative complications and the adherence to a surgical safety checklist, among a large sample of French surgical departments.
DOC.brief_title: Impact of Crew Resource Management Training to Improve the Effectiveness of Surgical Safety Checklist (IDILIC)
DOC.criteria: Age ≥ 18 years old Hospitalization ≥ 24 hours Available medical file Patient refusal
